Class breakout.animation extends Breakout implements Serializable

Class breakout.Breakout extends acm.program.GraphicsProgram implements Serializable

Random Generator

double DELAY
Delay for moving the ball

int brickCounter
Total amount of bricks

int vx
Velocity of the ball on the X-Axis

vy

int vy
Velocity of the ball on the Y-Axis

deaths

int deaths
Number of deaths for game mechanics

int numLives
Number of lives for score mechanics

numScore

int numScore
Score number for score mechanics

numScoreMod

int numScoreMod
Modifier amount used for score mechanics

numCombo

int numCombo
Amount of bricks broken in a row, reset after a death

go

boolean go
Boolean to run Breakout.playGame()

moveBall

boolean moveBall
Start and stops the ball movement

ballOnPaddle

boolean ballOnPaddle
Attempt to stop the ball on the paddle

score

acm.graphics.GLabel score
Creates a GLabel for the score you have in the game Used in Breakout.checkForCollidingObject() to effect the score

lives

acm.graphics.GLabel lives
Creates a GLabel for the number of lives (or turns) you have left Used in Breakout.checkForCollidingObject() to effect the amount of lives

combo

acm.graphics.GLabel combo
Creates a GLabel for the current combo Used in Breakout.checkForCollidingObject() to effect the combo sounds

paddle

acm.graphics.GRect paddle
Creates a GRect object for the paddle Used in Breakout.mouseMoved(MouseEvent e) and Breakout.checkForCollidingObject()

ball

acm.graphics.GOval ball
Creates a GOval object for the ball Used in Breakout.getHitSide(), Breakout.moveBall() and Breakout.resetBall()
